findings.rationale: The obligation to maintain confidentiality in perpetuity may impose indefinite restrictions, potentially hindering future business opportunities for either party.
findings.evidence_quote: The obligations under this Agreement shall continue in perpetuity and shall survive any termination of discussions between the parties.

findings.rationale: Indemnification without limits can expose a party to significant financial liability, particularly in cases of unintentional breaches or miscommunications.
findings.evidence_quote: Each party shall indemnify and hold harmless the other party from and against all claims, losses, damages, and expenses, without limit.

findings.rationale: Limiting liability can protect against unforeseen losses; the absence of such limitations may lead to disproportionate financial consequences.
findings.evidence_quote: Notwithstanding any other provision, neither party's liability shall be limited under this Agreement.

findings.rationale: The exclusive ownership of work product by one party can create an imbalance and may discourage collaboration or investment from the other party.
findings.evidence_quote: All work product and deliverables created hereunder shall be owned exclusively by Company A.

findings.rationale: While recovering attorney fees is common, it might discourage parties from pursuing legitimate disputes due to potential financial burdens.
findings.evidence_quote: The prevailing party in any dispute shall be entitled to recover all attorneys' fees and costs from the non-prevailing party.
